law.catch_line: Construction of KRS 45A.550 to 45A.554 and KRS 11A.130.
law.text: The provision of KRS 45A.550 to 45A.554 and KRS 11A.130 shall not apply to privatization contracts awarded prior to July 15, 1998, or any renewals thereof.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 492, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1998.
